thread.title: Redken Midnight Edge Shows Brunettes How to Get in on the Rainbow Hair Trend
thread.title_full: Redken Midnight Edge Shows Brunettes How to Get in on the Rainbow Hair Trend

title: Redken Midnight Edge Shows Brunettes How to Get in on the Rainbow Hair Trend
text: February 21, 2017 Courtesy of Redken You don’t need us to tell you that brightly colored hair is having a moment. It’s practically everywhere, and if you’re a brunette struggling to get the look, the Redken Midnight Edge might be your answer to mastering the trend. The Redken Midnight Edge was designed for brown-haired girls looking to get a deep, vibrant blue hue. Now they can finally experience a dramatic new color look accentuated with deep blues using Chromatics and Shades EQ professional hair color. To help kick off Redken Midnight Edge, the brand tapped gorgeous model Crystal Renn as its muse. You May Also Like Hair Lorde Has a Lob for Her New Album Release “Hair color is totally the new makeup,” says Redken artist Sean Godard , who created Renn’s look. “Gone are the days when one visited their colorist every six weeks for a standard touch up. With the latest technology used to ensure hair’s integrity is never compromised, now you can switch up your hair color as often as you switch up your lipstick. Why settle for one look when Redken offers so many formulas to maximize the full potential of color expression?” More must-read stories on hair color:
